title: LETS PROTEST AND STOP GIVING RIOT ANY OF OUR MONEY UNTIL SOMETHING IS DONE
body:
please riot can you guys do something about the toxic trash players in this game?
you have your new volunteers on boards telling us it's going to be okay but can you show us some statistics that reports are actually being looked at and bans are being implemented?
every 2 games i have someone telling me to kill myself, slit my wrists or drink bleach. calling me %%%% for no reason and making personal attacks because they get upset things aren't going their way.
or a smurf telling me 'this is my 2nd account i don't give a fuck if we lose because it doesn't effect LOLS'

are you guys trying to promote this childish anti social behavior?

i am going to make one of these posts every day until you guys can show us that you are making an effort to make this a better game for the players and not more skins so you guys get more money.

replies.body:
Something about the way the game is designed causes some people to tilt and be toxic. If you are looking for a quick fix for this there isn't one.

To be honest Riot have made many improvements that have reduced toxicity such as the role selection.

So if you are asking about whether they have done something, they have been for the past however many years. And will continue to do so.
what if i like being toxic and flaming my team/disrespecting the enemy team?
